text: �To Him ascends the good word, and as for righteous conduct, He raises it up�He said:Its outer meaning is supplication (duʿāʾ) and charity (ṣadaqa), and its inner meaning is remembrance(dhikr), while acting upon what you know and advancing through [following] the Sunna. He raises it up means, He makes it reach [Him] due to the presence within it of sincerity towards God, Exalted is He.His words:
